Package CCDD

Interface CcddImportExportInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CcddCSVHandler, CcddEDSHandler, CcddJSONHandler, CcddXTCEHandler
    public interface CcddImportExportInterface
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary import/export interface

    • Method Detail

      • getTableDefinitions

        java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.TableDefinition> getTableDefinitions()
        Get the imported table definitions
        Returns:
        List of imported table definitions; an empty list if no table definitions exist in the import file

      • getScriptAssociations

        java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getScriptAssociations()
        Get the list of original and new script associations
        Returns:
        List of original and new script associations; null if no new associations have been added

      • importFromFile

        void importFromFile​(CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar importFile,
                    CcddImportExportInterface.ImportType importType,
                    CcddTableTypeHandler.TypeDefinition targetTypeDefn,
                    boolean ignoreErrors,
                    boolean replaceExistingMacros,
                    boolean replaceExistingGroups)
             throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.Exception
        Build the information from the table definition(s) in the current file
        Parameters:
        importFile - reference to the user-specified input file
        importType - ImportType.IMPORT_ALL to import the table type, data type, and macro definitions, and the data from all the table definitions; ImportType.FIRST_DATA_ONLY to load only the data for the first table defined
        targetTypeDefn - table type definition of the table in which to import the data; ignored if importing all tables
        ignoreErrors - true to ignore all errors in the import file
        replaceExistingMacros - true to replace the values for existing macros
        replaceExistingGroups - true to replace existing group definitions
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If data is missing, extraneous, or an error in the import file
        java.io.IOException - If an import file I/O error occurs
        java.lang.Exception - If an unanticipated error occurs

      • exportToFile

        void exportToFile​(CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar exportFile,
                  java.lang.String[] tableNames,
                  boolean includeBuildInformation,
                  boolean replaceMacros,
                  boolean includeAllTableTypes,
                  boolean includeAllDataTypes,
                  boolean includeAllInputTypes,
                  boolean includeAllMacros,
                  boolean includeReservedMsgIDs,
                  boolean includeProjectFields,
                  boolean includeGroups,
                  boolean includeAssociations,
                  boolean includeVariablePaths,
                  CcddVariableHandler variableHandler,
                  java.lang.String[] separators,
                  java.lang.Object... extraInfo)
           throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                  CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException,
                  java.lang.Exception
        Export the project to the specified file
        Parameters:
        exportFile - reference to the user-specified output file
        tableNames - array of table names to convert
        includeBuildInformation - true to include the CCDD version, project, host, and user information
        replaceMacros - true to replace any embedded macros with their corresponding values
        includeAllTableTypes - true to include the all table type definitions in the export file
        includeAllDataTypes - true to include the all data type definitions in the export file
        includeAllInputTypes - true to include the all user-defined input type definitions in the export file
        includeAllMacros - true to include the all macro definitions in the export file
        includeReservedMsgIDs - true to include the contents of the reserved message ID table in the export file
        includeProjectFields - true to include the project-level data field definitions in the export file
        includeGroups - true to include the groups and group data field definitions in the export file
        includeAssociations - true to include the script associations in the export file
        includeVariablePaths - true to include the variable path for each variable in a structure table, both in application format and using the user-defined separator characters
        variableHandler - variable handler class reference; null if includeVariablePaths is false
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s); null if includeVariablePaths is false
        extraInfo - extra parameters dependent on the export format
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - If an error occurs marshaling the project
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs executing an external (script) method
        java.lang.Exception - If an unanticipated error occurs
